actions.description: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The dragon exhales a wave of psychic dissonance in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 22 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 56 (16d6) psychic damage, and until the end of its next turn, when the creature makes an attack roll or an ability check, it must roll a d8 and reduce the total by the number rolled. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects.
actions.name: Disorienting Breath (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description:
The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible), minor illusion

1/day each: detect thoughts, dispel magic, etherealness, major image, mislead
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)

actions.description: The dragon makes one Claw attack.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The dragon uses Psychic Step or Spellcasting.
actions.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)

actions.description: The dragon creates a dancing mote of green flame around a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 42 (12d6) fire damage.
actions.name: Emerald Embers (Costs 3 Actions)

specialTraits.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and can leave a 20-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.
specialTraits.name: Tunneler

specialTraits.description: The dragon can cast mirage arcane, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability.
specialTraits.name: Warp Perception (1/Day)
